SyncLAPSPassword.meaning: A principal with this signifies the capability of retrieving, through a directory synchronization, the value of confidential and RODC filtered attributes, such as LAPS' ms-Mcs-AdmPwd.

DirSync.description: To abuse these privileges, use DirSync to sync LAPS passwords

Manual_LDAP.command: # DirSync is Windows-specific, no direct Linux equivalent available
Manual_LDAP.description: DirSync functionality is Windows-specific and requires specific Active Directory replication rights
